TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstallException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 在安装的提交、回滚或卸载阶段发生错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs during the commit, rollback, or uninstall phase of an installation.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例以及中的示例构造函数，在一起构成了一个示例，演示具有其自己的安装程序程序集。The following example, plus the examples in the constructors, together make up an example showing an assembly having its own installer. 安装名为`MyInstaller`，它具有特性`RunInstallerAttribute`，该值指示此安装程序将调用[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。The installer is named `MyInstaller`, which has an attribute `RunInstallerAttribute`, indicating that this installer will be invoked by [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). [Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)调用的方法， ，和。[Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) calls the methods , , and . 中的代码假定文件命名为`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在之前安装程序集可以将其提交。The code in presumes that a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists before the installation of the assembly can be committed. 如果该文件`FileDoesNotExist.txt`不存在，引发。If the file `FileDoesNotExist.txt` does not exist, raises an . 是用例和中的卸载将仅才会发生如果名为的文件`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在。The same is the case with in which an uninstallation will only happen if a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists. 否则，它会发出。Otherwise it raises an . 在，执行的代码片段，这可能会引发异常。In , a code fragment is executed, which might raise an exception. 如果引发异常时，它捕获和引发该异常传递给它。If the exception is raised, it is caught and an is raised with that exception being passed to it. > [!NOTE] > 运行此示例 Installutil.exe 的帮助。Run this example with the help of Installutil.exe. 在命令提示符处键入：Type this in the command prompt: `Installutil InstallException.exe` 或-or- `Installutil /u InstallException.exe` [!code-cpp[InstallException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallException/CPP/installexception.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallException/CS/installexception.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallException/VB/installexception.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数。The following example demonstrates the constructor. 它是该示例的一部分类。It is a part of the example of the class. 在此示例中，调用 Installutil.exe方法。In this example, Installutil.exe calls the method. 中的代码假定文件命名为`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在之前安装程序集可以将其提交。The code in presumes that a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists before the installation of the assembly can be committed. 如果该文件`FileDoesNotExist.txt`不存在，引发。If the file `FileDoesNotExist.txt` does not exist, raises an . > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用的重载版本之一构造函数。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the constructor. 有关可能会提供其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. span.span: The message to display to the user.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为 ，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定要向用户显示的消息，以及对作为该异常原因的内部异常的引用。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, and specifies the message to display to the user, and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
